featured.text: If the sculpting does not take place in a cold environment, then the sculptor must work quickly to finish his piece.
The right theme for ice sculpting is not easy to find.
The tools used for sculpting also affect when the task can be accomplished.
Another difficulty in the process of ice sculpting is time control.

definition.zh_def: 雕塑藝術，指用材料（如石頭、金屬或黏土）創作三維藝術品的過程。
definition.en_def: The art of creating three-dimensional works by shaping materials such as stone, metal, or clay.
definition.example: She spent hours sculpting a beautiful figure out of clay.
